niagara.optimizer.rules
Class ConstructedRule

java.lang.Object
  niagara.optimizer.colombia.Rule
      niagara.optimizer.rules.ParsedRule
          niagara.optimizer.rules.ConstructedRule

public class ConstructedRule
extends ParsedRule

Constructed rules are rules constructed at run time from an XML specification (but can have more complex before and after patterns than SimpleRule allows).
